[vc_row][vc_column]

Extrusion Blow Moulding Machines

[vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]WASHUN Machinery provides the packaging containers with volumes ranging from a few milliliters to 300 liters, large containers with capacities of up to 1,000 liters. Machinery and Molds from WASHUN Machinery makes manufacturing of Blow moulded products simple, regardless whether equipped with a continuous or accumulator parison head, featuring hydraulic or hybrid electric drive and other techniques. Close cooperation betweenWASHUNand its customers adds to the success.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4318″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/portfolio/mg-s-series-extrusion-blow-moulding-machine-single-station/”]
MG-S Series Extrusion Blow Moulding Machine
[vc_column_text]The MG-S series is single station extrusion blow moulding machine for containers from 5ml up to 18L, their high level of reliability,[More][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4312″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/portfolio/mg-d-series-extrusion-blow-moulding-machine-double-station/”]
MG-D Series Extrusion Blow Moulding Machine
[vc_column_text]The MG-D series is double station extrusion blow moulding machine for containers from 5ml up to 18L, Its high level of reliability,[More][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4315″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/portfolio/mg-pc25l-extrusion-blow-moulding-machine/”]
MG-PC25L Extrusion Blow Moulding Machine
[vc_column_text]MG-PC25L Extrusion blow moulding machine is designed for producing 5 gallon PC bottles, with the relatively low capital investment,[More][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4322″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/portfolio/mg-sl-series-accumulator-head-extrusion-blow-moulding-machines/”]
Accumulator Head Extrusion Blow Moulding Machines
[vc_column_text]This Series of Accumulator Head Extrusion Blow Moulding Machines is mainly applicable to the production of various packing barrels[More][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4319″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/portfolio/mg-s250l-extrusion-blow-moulding-machine/”]
MG-S250L Extrusion Blow Moulding Machine
[vc_column_text]Extrusion blow molding machine with accumulator parison head which holds materials storage capacity up to 20KG,[More][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
